title: ChatGPT boss’s ex-boyfriend’s house targeted in $11M crypto heist by fake delivery man
description: The victim was tied up and tortured as the attacker drained his crypto wallet of Bitcoin and Ethereum.

title: Crypto market wipes out $1 trillion amid Bitcoin crash
description: NEW YORK: The crypto market has plunged sharply over the past six weeks, erasing nearly $1 trillion in value, marking one of the worst months in the history of digital assets. Read More: Bitcoin plunge deepens as crypto market crashes  Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, reached an all-time high of $126,000 in early October before falling to $81,000 […]

title: Bitcoin Erases 2025 Gains: Is $83,500 the Next Stop or $120K Recovery?
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has given back everything it gained in 2025. The rally started in early January and peaked at $126,000 on October 6, but the Bitcoin price erased all those gains over the past six weeks. ETF flows reversed, miners sold into weakness, and macro conditions turned against risk assets. BTC briefly touched $81,000 ... Bitcoin Erases 2025 Gains: Is $83,500 the Next Stop or $120K Recovery?The post Bitcoin Erases 2025 Gains: Is $83,500 the Next Stop or $120K Recovery? appeared first on 24/7 Wall St..

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF Offers Dual Crypto Exposure
description: New research from CoinShares breaks down why Bitcoin and Ethereum function as complementary rather than competing assets, a distinction that could support the investment case for dual-exposure products like the CoinShares Bitcoin and Ether ETF (BTF). BTF tracks the price performance of both Bitcoin and Ethereum without directly holding the underlying cryptocurrencies, according to ETF [...]The post Bitcoin, Ethereum ETF Offers Dual Crypto Exposure appeared first on ETF Trends.

title: Blackrock's iShares bitcoin fund sees record exodus as crypto heads for worst month since 2022
description: Blackrock's spot bitcoin ETF has so far seen $2.2 billion worth of outflows in November as its underlying crypto continues to crater.
